definitions.definition: From here, from this place, away
From the living or from this world
definitions.example: After a long battle, my poor daughter was taken hence.

definitions.definition: (of a length of time) in the future from now
definitions.example: A year hence it will be forgotten.

definitions.definition: As a result; therefore, for this reason
definitions.example: I shall go to Japan and hence will not be here in time for the party.
